full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Project Title and Reference

* **Project Title (English):** Propeller Hub Assembly (782701-5)
* **Project Title (French):** Ensemble de moyeu d'hélice (782701-5)
* **Reference Number (French):** PW-CAG-010-29190
* **Solicitation Number (French):** T8493-230042/A

#### Tender Details

* **Closing Date for Tenders**: November 3, 2023 at 2:00 PM
* **Expected Start Date**: N/A
* **Expected End Date**: N/A

#### Acquisition Strategy

* **Solicitation Procedure**: Request for Proposal (RFP) open only to Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders
* **Supply Arrangement Series**: T8493-140035
* **Notice Type**: Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Goods and Services

* **Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**: Supply Arrangement (SA) T8493-140035 Series
* **Delivery Date**: October 11, 2023
* **Tender Description**: The requirement is to acquire Propeller Hub Assemblies (PN: 782701-5 PROPELLER HUB ASSEMBLY - (142F-7 ACCEPTABLE REPLACEMENT)) for the Dash 8 aircraft for Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD).

#### Instructions to Tenders

* **Contact Information**:
  * Name: Edmond Egikian
  * Email: [edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  * Phone: (343) 572-4437
  * Address: 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **Required Documents**: Must be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Disclaimer

* **Crown Rights**: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* **Ongoing Opportunity**: A Notice will be posted at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more Suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series.

### Acknowledgement

This tender announcement is publicly
